ThingDef.label: temperate honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by temperate bees. Temperate bees are the most common type of bee, descended from Earth's Apis Mellifera, the European Honey Bee. Honeycombs can be procesed in a Honey Extractor to get honey and beeswax.

ThingDef.label: mild honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by mild bees. Mild bees are bees adapted to average temperatures and mild climates, and they produce little honey. Honeycombs can be procesed in a Honey Extractor to get honey and beeswax.

ThingDef.label: arctic honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by arctic bees. Arctic bees have adapted to the colder climates on the Rim, and their honeycombs store honey and frost in equal amounts. Honeycombs can be procesed in a Honey Extractor to get honey and beeswax.

ThingDef.label: arctic honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by icy bees. Icy bees have been genetically modified to operate at frigid temperatures. Their icy honeycombs can be used to extract honey and frost. Honeycombs can be procesed in a Honey Extractor to get honey and beeswax.

ThingDef.label: jungle honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by jungle bees. This comb has a pungent smell, saturated with lots of organic compounds extracted from the exotic flora of the tropical rainforests. Honeycombs can be procesed in a Honey Extractor to get honey and beeswax.

ThingDef.label: swamp honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by swamp bees. A gelatinous substance covers the whole comb, seemingly to protect its contents from the high humidity of the environment. Honeycombs can be procesed in a Honey Extractor to get honey and beeswax.

ThingDef.label: desert honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by desert bees. Its wax has a parched texture, partly built with the surrounding sand. Honeycombs can be procesed in a Honey Extractor to get honey and beeswax.

ThingDef.label: arid honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by arid bees. Since arid bees have adapted to extremely dry climates, this comb seems to be almost devoid of humidity, with low honey amounts. Honeycombs can be procesed in a Honey Extractor to get honey and beeswax.
